org.youscope.common.image

Interface ImageProducer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AutoFocusJob, CellDetectionJob, ComposedImagingJob, ContinuousImagingJob, ImagingJob, OutOfFocusJob, ShortContinuousImagingJob, SlimJob

    public interface ImageProducer
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Indicates that a given job produces images, and allows to add a listener to obtain produced images.
    Author:
    langmo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addImageListener(ImageListener listener)
      Adds a listener which is invoked if the camera of the microscope made a new picture.
      java.lang.String getImageDescription()
      Returns a short string describing the images which are made by this job.
      int getNumberOfImages()
      Returns the number of images which get produced per evaluation of the respective job.
      void removeImageListener(ImageListener listener)
      Removes a previously added image listener.

    • Method Detail

      • addImageListener

        void addImageListener(ImageListener listener)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Adds a listener which is invoked if the camera of the microscope made a new picture. A listener can always be added, even if the respective measurement is already running.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener which detects new pictures.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • removeImageListener

        void removeImageListener(ImageListener listener)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Removes a previously added image listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener which was previously added.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getImageDescription

        java.lang.String getImageDescription()
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns a short string describing the images which are made by this job.
        Returns:
        Description of the image.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getNumberOfImages

        int getNumberOfImages()
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the number of images which get produced per evaluation of the respective job. Typically, this is one. However, some jobs can produce more than one image, and the number of the produced images may or may not depend on the configuration. Some jobs might even produce no images at all for certain configurations (but usually for other configurations they produce images, otherwise this interface would not make sense to implement).
        Returns:
        Number of produced images. Zero indicate that no images are produced by this job type at all. Negative numbers indicate that the number of images is not known, or that it might even vary.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
